::CyberShark::

    He began to cry. He finally found a CR Chamber and lowe=
red her inside. His now crimson eyes were tear filled when he pushed the bu=
tton for repair.
    "I love you too," He left the room and went outside th=
e CF. "Kluster, or any Maximal on the CF, please notify me once Battera is =
out of the CR Chamber, I'm going to kill, well, I don't know his name."
   =
 He went out, and with his low power reserves he really shouldn't have. But=
 he soon caught up to a wolfish bot.
    "Are you CyberShark?" It asked.
  =
  "Yes, what are you after?" CyberShark asked, sensing a quest in this bot.=

    "I'm after Primal Prime."
    "What?! Why? He is a Maximal, like you,"=
 CyberShark said.
    "Not anymore, I can smell the stench of evil on him."=
 Eclipse said.
    "On Optimus Prime? I can't believe it." CyberShark said =
as he sped past him and after Dark Prime.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
 From: logomorph@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

eptember 23, 2000 7:06 PM
  Subject: Re: The CF, and CyberShark's Return

       My Groups | nbwrpg Main Page  


  ::Battera::

  She rolle=
d onto her side and gasped in pain.  She cried.  She coun't 
  really move =
at all.  The wound sent waves of pain through her body.  
  She cried and w=
hispered, "CYbershark,   I love you." She closed her 
  eyes and passed out=
, laying on her side, in a growing puddle of mech 
  fluid.
